titlestmt.titleproper: BFC/A Interviews and Events collection, 1981-present, COL 8
titlestmt.subtitle: A Guide to Holdings at the Indiana University Black Film Center/Archive
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Ronda L. Sewald

note.p: ÂŠ 2018 Trustees of Indiana University. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-07-02 04:03:22 -0400.

change.item: Finding aid updated by Ronda L. Sewald
Finding aid edited and encoded by Ronda L. Sewald

did.abstract: This is an artificially created collection that contains recordings and promotional materials for interviews and events created as part of the Indiana University Black Film Center/Archive's ongoing in-house research and outreach initatives.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public. Audiovisual materials may require the creation of reference copies. If you are interested in reviewing the contents of the audio or video recordings in this collection, please contact the BFC/A staff well in advance of your visit for details.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This is an artificially created collection that contains recordings and promotional materials for interviews and events created as part of the Indiana University Black Film Center/Archive's ongoing in-house research and outreach initatives.

list.item: Series 2. BFC/A South African Filmmakers interview recordings
Series 6. BFC/A In Touch with the Spirit conference materials (cataloged as separate collection)

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Recordings, photographs, promotional materials, and other documents created by BFC/A staff beginning in 1981 unless otherwise indicated.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: All requests for copying and publishing materials must be submitted in writing to the BFC/A archivist. Some reproduction/publication requests may also require the written permission of interviewers, interviewees, and/or performers.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [item], BFC/A Interviews and Events collection, COL 8, Black Film Center/Archive, Indiana University, Bloomington.
